title: About conception and contraception
creator_credit: Dorothy Courtois and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: Animated drawings illustrate how conception occurs and the way that various birth control devices, surgical methods and ‘the pill’ function in effecting contraception. Without spoken commentary this film is designed to be used by professional personnel.
creator_credit_for_label: Dorothy Courtois and National Film Board of Canada
